name: angularjs-responsive-navbar
description: A responsive navbar component for angular 1.x

scripts.gh-pages: cat index.scss | ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass --output-style expanded > navbar.css && ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js index.js -o bin/angularJSNavbar.js -t [ stringify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && ./node_modules/markdown-to-html/bin/github-markdown README.md > docs/README.html && cp navbar.css docs/navbar.css && cp bin/angularJSNavbar.js docs/angularJSNavbar.js

author: Aaron Turner
